Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FlipChain" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="SerialNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BuffersEmpty" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Index" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexUnconfirmed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="hSurface" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FlipChain" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="SerialNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BuffersEmpty" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Index" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IndexUnconfirmed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="hSurface" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="AsyncFlushType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Hwnd" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="xSizeOld" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ySizeOld" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="formatOld" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="xSizeNew" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ySizeNew" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="formatNew" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FlipChain" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <struct name="DwmTimingInfo"> <data name="cbSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="rateRefreshNumerator" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="rateRefreshDenominator" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="qpcRefreshPeriod" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="rateComposeNumerator" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="rateComposeDenominator" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="qpcVBlank" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefresh" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cDxRefresh" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="qpcCompose" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFrame" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cDxPresent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cRefreshFrame" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFrameSubmitted" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cDxPresentSubmitted" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cFrameConfirmed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cDxPresentConfirmed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cRefreshConfirmed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cDxRefreshConfirmed" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cFramesLate" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesOutstanding" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cFrameDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="qpcFrameDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshFrameDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFrameComplete" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="qpcFrameComplete" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramePending" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="qpcFramePending" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesComplete" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesPending" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesAvailable" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesDropped" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cFramesMissed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshNextDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshNextPresented" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshesDisplayed" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshesPresented" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cRefreshStarted" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cPixelsReceived" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cPixelsDrawn" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="cBuffersEmpty" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FlipChain" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="UpdateId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="fRelative" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="cRefreshesChange" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="cRefreshes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Hwnd" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="MessageId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="hwnd" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="fExcludedFromLivePreview" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="logicalSurfaceHandle" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="spriteHandle" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="windowHandle" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>
